A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fun to watch but couldn't respect it in the morning. Can forgive plot-contrived boring adventures and the deliberately-withheld info that made them possible\, or even\, SuperLeia\, but it was anticlimactic with so many missed opportunities (for a moment\, we thought we were about to have a really great climax that would make up for being cheated out of a cool mentor/student relationship and training story) but eh\, what a let-down.
